attributes.action: Stop charging NHS STAFF TO PAY TO PARK AT WORK
attributes.additional_details:
This is a disgrace to charge staff to pay to park at work , us staff pay enough in tax and National insurance as it is without this extra unfair and unjust charge. 
We see no evidence of where the millions made each year go. 
It is a stealth tax on the staff working in hospitals in England
attributes.background:
I want the government to stop charging staff to park at hospitals where they work . 
The government should pressure the health secretary to stop this charge.
